message.rftoolsbuilder.builder.header: This block can quarry areas, pump liquids, move/copy/swap structures, collect items and XP, move entities, build structures, ...
message.rftoolsbuilder.builder.gold: Infusing bonus: reduced power consumption and increased speed
message.rftoolsbuilder.shield_block1.hea: This machine forms a shield out of adjacent template blocks. It can filter based on type of mob and do various things (damage, solid, ...). Use the Smart Wrench to add sections to the shield
message.rftoolsbuilder.shield_block1.gol: Infusing bonus: reduced power consumption and increased damage
message.rftoolsbuilder.shield_block2.hea: This machine forms a shield out of adjacent template blocks. It can filter based on type of mob and do various things (damage, solid, ...). Use the Smart Wrench to add sections to the shield
message.rftoolsbuilder.shield_block2.gol: Infusing bonus: reduced power consumption and increased damage
message.rftoolsbuilder.shield_block3.hea: This machine forms a shield out of adjacent template blocks. It can filter based on type of mob and do various things (damage, solid, ...). Use the Smart Wrench to add sections to the shield
message.rftoolsbuilder.shield_block3.gol: Infusing bonus: reduced power consumption and increased damage
message.rftoolsbuilder.shield_block4.hea: This machine forms a shield out of adjacent template blocks. It can filter based on type of mob and do various things (damage, solid, ...). Use the Smart Wrench to add sections to the shield
message.rftoolsbuilder.shield_block4.gol: Infusing bonus: reduced power consumption and increased damage
message.rftoolsbuilder.blue_shield_templ: This block can be used to build a shield. The set of template blocks with the same color should touch the shield projector
message.rftoolsbuilder.red_shield_templa: This block can be used to build a shield. The set of template blocks with the same color should touch the shield projector
message.rftoolsbuilder.green_shield_temp: This block can be used to build a shield. The set of template blocks with the same color should touch the shield projector
message.rftoolsbuilder.yellow_shield_tem: This block can be used to build a shield. The set of template blocks with the same color should touch the shield projector
message.rftoolsbuilder.shape_card.header: This card represents an area that can be used by the shield or builder. Sneak right click on builder to start mark mode, then right click to mark two corners of wanted area
rftoolsbuilder.category.main.description: RFTools Builder is a mod about large-scale area manipulation
rftoolsbuilder.category.shape_cards.desc: Shape Cards are items that represent a certain shape. They can be used by the Builder and the Shield Projector
rftoolsbuilder.category.builder.descript: The Builder is a very versatile block to build, quarry, or collect
rftoolsbuilder.category.shield.descripti: The Shield Projector can protect areas as well as kill mobs
rftoolsbuilder.page.shape_card_def0: The Default Shape Card is used for building (by the Builder) or describing a shape for the Shield Projector
rftoolsbuilder.page.shape_card_def_quarr: The Quarry Card describes a shape for the Builder. In addition to the shape you can also specify that you want to void certain blocks. There are a few variants of this shape card (clearing/non-clearing, fortune, and silk-touch)
rftoolsbuilder.page.shape_card_def_void0: With the Void Card you can void ares with the Builder
rftoolsbuilder.page.shape_card_liquid0: The Liquid Card can be used to place liquids by the Builder
rftoolsbuilder.page.shape_card_pump0: The Pump Card can be used to pump quarries by the Builder
rftoolsbuilder.page.builder_intro0: The Builder is a versatile block that can quarry, build, pump, collect XP and items and more. Use one of the shape cards to control what has to be done
rftoolsbuilder.page.builder_target0: There are various ways to control the area that the Builder will affect. ... @todo
rftoolsbuilder.page.shield_intro0: The Shield Projector can be used to protect areas against mobs or keep mobs in some area. It can also cause damage
